bibliography.AU: Briones, J; Toro, P; Encinas, A; Caballero, L; Denardin, JC; Melo, F; Cerda, E; Robert, S; Lacour, D; Montaigne, F
bibliography.AF: Briones, J.; Toro, P.; Encinas, A.; Caballero, L.; Denardin, J. C.; Melo, F.; Cerda, E.; Robert, S.; Lacour, D.; Montaigne, F.
bibliography.TI: Large area patterned magnetic films by depositing cobalt layers on nano-wrinkled polydimethylsiloxane templates
bibliography.ID: THIN-FILMS; ELASTOMERIC POLYMER; SELF-ORGANIZATION; ANODIC ALUMINA; SURFACES; ARRAYS; ELECTRODEPOSITION; BIOCOMPATIBILITY; IRRADIATION; ELECTRONICS
bibliography.AB: We report on a method to fabricate laterally modulated Co films using the artificially induced nano-wrinkled surface of a polydimethylsiloxane polymeric film as template. Large area patterning of self-organized parallel wrinkles is formed displaying a submicrometer wavelength. The subsequent deposition of a Co layer on this wavy surface yields a uniaxial magnetic anisotropy imposed by the wrinkles' morphology. Measurement of the remanent magnetization and coercive field as a function of the field angle confirms the uniaxial nature of the anisotropy and reveals a reversal mechanism more complex than pure coherent rotation. The magnetostatic origin of the anisotropy is analyzed. (C) 2013 AIP Publishing LLC.
